computer_commander.desc_unlocked: You built a computer, powered it up with sound and wireless, connected its brain to a memory, and brought it to life on your screen. You are a Computer Commander.
computer_commander.title: Computer Commander

minecraft_master.desc_locked: Check out Make Minecraft to unlock this badge...
minecraft_master.desc_unlocked: You used code blocks to build towers, volcanos, and forcefields, and made Minecraft your tech playground. You are a Minecraft Master.
minecraft_master.title: Minecraft Master

music_marvel.desc_locked: Check out Make Music to unlock this badge...
music_marvel.desc_unlocked: You wrote code that made sounds, then put them together in a beautiful melody. Keep grooving to the beat of life, you're a Music Marvel.
music_marvel.title: Music Marvel

pong_pro.desc_locked: Check out Make Pong to unlock this badge...
pong_pro.desc_unlocked: Pong was the first videogame ever – invented in the 1980s by a dude named Al. Now you've made his creation even cooler with your own code, your own rules, your own colors. You are a Pong Pro.
pong_pro.title: Pong Pro

snake_survivor.desc_locked: Check out Make Snake to unlock this badge...
snake_survivor.desc_unlocked: You turned simple white text into a slithery game, then made it as luscious as an Amazonian jungle. You ate apples and dodged the beasties – you're a Snake Survivor.
snake_survivor.title: Snake Survivor

video_voyager.desc_locked: Check out Video to unlock this badge...
video_voyager.desc_unlocked: You summoned a simple video player that can stream any movie or show in the world – in high-def! Keep watching, keep playing, you're a Video Voyager.
video_voyager.title: Video Voyager
